## Overview

unifiedWMWqPCR is a Bioconductor package for the unified Wilcoxon-Mann-Whitney U test in a qPCR context.

See also

[http://bioconductor.org/packages/release/bioc/html/unifiedWMWqPCR.html](http://bioconductor.org/packages/release/bioc/html/unifiedWMWqPCR.html)
